name: student-feedback-mailer
description: Electron app for emailing student feedback via Outlook.

scripts.dist: rm -rf dist && electron-packager . "Student Feedback Mailer" --platform=darwin --arch=arm64 --out dist --overwrite --prune=true && cd dist && ditto -c -k --sequesterRsrc --keepParent "Student Feedback Mailer-darwin-arm64/Student Feedback Mailer.app" "Student Feedback Mailer-mac.zip"
